channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.2 is available
item.description: PrestaShop 8.2.2 is here! This latest patch version brings a range of updates, addressing reported issues and introducing enhancements to improve the platform for merchants and developers alike.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - June 2025
item.description: We are back with yet another edition of the PrestaShop Core Monthly, your monthly digest of the PrestaShop codebase’s latest changes and news from the PrestaShop project.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.x is now in the extended support phase
item.description: Now that PrestaShop 9.0 is out, here is a focus on maintained branches of the PrestaShop project and what to expect.

item.title: Call for Speakers: PrestaShop Developer Conference Returns in November 2025
item.description: We are very excited to announce that the call for presentations is now open for the third edition of the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place in Paris on November 19, 2025, in a hybrid format, with both onsite and online attendance options.

item.title: Call for contributions: hooks - initiative summary
item.description: During this year’s FoP Days, we launched a new community initiative focused on improving a specific part of the PrestaShop project: hooks. Rather than casting a wide net, we deliberately concentrated on a single topic. The goal was to make it easier and faster for contributors to submit changes, and for project members to validate them.

item.title: Dominik Shaim Ulrich: contributing locally with a business providing hosting services
item.description: Ever wondered who’s behind a GitHub username? Now’s your chance to find out! Contributor interviews, like the one you are about to read, let you connect with the people driving the PrestaShop project forward.

item.title: PrestaShop 9 is available
item.description: It’s finally here! PrestaShop 9 is available for download. This new version brings a modernized architecture, new developer tools, and powerful features designed to support the future of ecommerce.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0 RC1 is now available!
item.description: The first Release Candidate of PrestaShop 9.0 is now available for testing. This is a significant milestone in the development cycle, and we encourage all users to test it thoroughly.

item.title: PSDevCon2024: Cybersecurity – What No One Dares to Say
item.description: Application security is often a forgotten aspect of the digital world. Everyone agrees that it is essential, but no one really wants to face its consequences. Today, in this guest blog post, it’s time to share the truths that no one wants to say.

item.title: Codencode agency - contributing to work more sustainably over time
item.description: Ever wondered who’s behind a GitHub username? Now’s your chance to find out! Contributor interviews, like the one you are about to read, let you connect with the people driving the PrestaShop project forward.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - April 2025
item.description: On April 23rd, 2025, we hosted another Live Update for the PrestaShop Project. This time we focused on two subjects, the Update Assistant release and the Targeted Contributions initiative.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update April 2025
item.description: The upcoming PrestaShop Project Live Update will take place on Wednesday, April 23rd, 2025 at 4pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - March 2025
item.description: What’s new in the project? We’re ending the quarter strong! Project members with the help of the community have been working hard to prepare the next major release of PrestaShop. Release of the completely new version of the Auto Upgrade Update Assistant module, and that’s only a glimpse of the work done in March. Read on to learn more about the latest changes in the PrestaShop project.

item.title: FOP Days 2025 - a wrap-up
item.description: The 2025 edition of Friends of Presta (FOP) Days has come to an end, leaving behind two days of discussions, technical insights, and networking. Held on March 26-27 at Le Nida in Issy-les-Moulineaux, the event brought together developers, agencies, and ecommerce professionals from the PrestaShop community.

item.title: Update Assistant module v7.0.0 is available (Autoupgrade)
item.description: We are pleased to introduce the latest major release of the Update Assistant module (formerly known as 1-Click Upgrade).
